lines.text: I was passing by Dugan's lunch wagon when a hot dog ran out and bit me.
Whatever you've done is my fault because I taught you to fear the Lord but never to love Him, and LOVE is the most important thing.
Danny, you've got to make this cement right! You can't break the law of God and Man and expect to get away with it!

[catching John with another woman]
There's still one commandment he hasn't broken, he hasn't killed anybody yet.
How much cement are you really putting into that mix?
[the worker brushes him off so he gets forceful with him and asks again]
One part to twelve. I was told to double the sand and reduce the cement.
